RECEIVED.TITLE: Pending invitations.
RECEIVED.SUBTITLE_1: Accepts or rejects friends, group, and channel invitations.
RECEIVED.INVITE_YOU: invites you to join his friends
RECEIVED.INVITE_IN_GROUP: invites you to join the group {{groupName}}
RECEIVED.INVITE_IN_CHANNEL: invites you to join the channel {{channelName}}
RECEIVED.NO_INVITATIONS: You do not have any pending invitation requests yet.
